con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="riskEstimator" targetNamespace="http://www.websigni.org/piglets/riskEstimator/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:risk="http://www.websigni.org/piglets/riskEstimator/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.websigni.org/piglets/riskEstimator/"> <xsd:element name="RiskEstimationRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="surname" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="age" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="nationality" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="familyStatus" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="RiskEstimationResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="riskPoints" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="riskLevel" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="EstimateRiskRequest"> <wsdl:part element="risk:RiskEstimationRequest" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="EstimateRiskResponse"> <wsdl:part element="risk:RiskEstimationResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="riskEstimator"> <wsdl:operation name="EstimateRisk"> <wsdl:input message="risk:EstimateRiskRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="risk:EstimateRiskResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="riskEstimatorSOAP" type="risk:riskEstimator"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="EstimateRisk"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://localhost:9999/EstimateRisk"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="riskEstimator"> <wsdl:port binding="risk:riskEstimatorSOAP" name="riskEstimatorSOAP"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:9999"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

con:mockOperation.name: EstimateRisk
